column1:
easy to install and is very fast to boot and all however the read and write speeds arent exactly to the description they have provided

also with the wd black dashboard with the gaming mode enabled i actually got lower read and write than without the gaming mode strange

but definitely worth the money and was super easy to install

fitted to acer nitro gaming laptop after realising that it never came with a mmc as standard after a bit of research i was pleased to know that adding this mmc would boost performance and it certainly did ran a few benchmarks and the improvement was amazing the laptop performs like a different machine and the startups a fast

freindly warning so theres dont purchase the wrong ssd great little card but you will need the wd black sn850 1tb m2 pcie 40 nvme ssdsolid state drive to work properly in the ps5 as my son found out great ssd for other devices just not playstation
excellent speed not as fast as samsung evo series but you wont even notice it during day to day use definitely worth buying and great discounted price for 1tb

i bought 2 of these one with a heatsink and one without my msi motherboard already came with one but my asus b550 gaming one didnt so double check its best to have one looks great through the glass window performance is spoton

easy to install works as intended and easy to transfer my existing os over using wds drive clone tool everything worked first time and the drive easily reaches the advertised speeds often faster 1010 would buy again for another build recommend to a friend

easyish to install a few bios changes to make speed not up to spec yet but think thats down to my config great value at the time i got fit a little over £100 for the size as cheap as an ssd would buy again

gamers buy one its seriously fast
make sure you download the wd dashboard from wd and use the dashboard to set the ssd into gamer mode then it never sleeps its always ready to go

bought this to upgrade the ssd in my ultrabook im not one for benchmark numbers and such but it is noticeably faster
at the time of writing i think this ssd hits the sweet spot in terms of priceperformance very happy with my purchase

excellent upgrade over the hdd that was dying installed in a dell latitude e5570 with i7 6820hq the picture speaks for the performance not top speeds but perfect for what i need i would recommend if you cant quite stretch to a samsung

so much faster than my wd veloci raptor 1000 rpm drives did not think there would be much difference still needs to be scanned and optimised and maintenance done on your system to get the best out of the drive but this is good board bios then boot up from windows is in your face once you enter your password you want fast this is it
great ssd super fast although there are faster drives out there this is all you need certainly for a mid tier gaming rig
i got it a great price on black friday so it was a fantastic buy as ssds go it is a solid performer
perfect for a gaming drive easy to install just popped it in under the thermal plate on my motherboard and moved my games over easy
its working perfectly i love it
i bought this product to replace my hard drive i am enjoying how quick it is to load games and programs m2 is an amazing technology and will always recommend it
works great but cloning the entire system doesnt seem to work i used macrium had to install a new system on it myself other than that it works great and fast
great speed great price

this storage is insane pop it into a usb40thunderbolt enclosure and wd 750 and its blisteringly fast im get readwrite speeds of 23002500 on my mac mini m1 its a decent price and im super impressed get 256gb mac and future proof it with this thing
great drive very fast and well priced works very well on my z390 motherboard as main boot drive

the first ssd delivered was faulty windows would not install reported the drive couldnt be written to the wd diagnostics reported smart faults it was replaced straight away by amazon and the replacement unit is working perfectly

i bought this for my laptop and it is like having a new computer again

games that were slow to load now load instantly and even some performance issues have been solved now

awesome ssd i will buy another for my next pc

i replaced my old ssd with this 1tb ssd
the reading speed more than 3000 mbs it closes to 3430mbs from the product description
wd also provides a dashboard to monitor the ssd performance it can be downloaded from wd website

great product has all of the features listed and performs as expected

the dashboard was pretty useless so you can just overwrite it with a simple format

gets a little warm under load though it remains stable despite this

this memory is just great very fast and easy to use loaded windows 10 from start to finish in lest that 8 minutes and that with my slow typing boot up into windows lightingly fast also if your into gaming this is a must have for your storage

ordered this and it arrived early well packaged and protected fitting was easy although with my motherboard asrock pro the screw to hold in place was difficult to get at bluetack on the end of a screwdriver worked a treat
excellent performance and value recommended

easy to install in my razer laptop great speeds and included wd black software
the only downside is ill fill 1tb up quickly
a decent price and easy to install as with all nvme performs very well cant fault it
had a solid state drive but this thing is an absolute beast the difference is amazing

great drive and the nvme performance has made a world of difference for boot and load times fits very well with the asus rog strix b550f gaming amd b550 ddr4 atx motherboard socket am4 motherboard as it comes with a couple of nvme heatsinks
great cant fault
installed and shows up immediately no formatting or activation required installed the software which is optional its rubbish luckily the drive itself is great
very fast ssd easy to install a good buy

fast well built and amazing performance even after hitting the cache limits this is the major reason to get this over a cheaper nvme drive this will sustain fast writes for far far longer than the cheaper drives that have a tiny cache

the next step up are the samsung evo and pro lines which take the after cache performance up another level
got this on discount for £100 and very much worth the money very fast got benchmarks as 3300mbps happy with it
one of the best at this price range fast and solid
i upgraded my pc with this and i was so happy i bought another for my razer laptop
bought to upgrade to bigger capacity it does feel like its bit faster than my older one was i have been using it about a month now so far all good
was expecting better boot speeds and launch speeds from this but realistically not much change however it is slick and nice to have compared to a standard ssd

bought this for a new computer i was building
i knew it was something special when it took less than 20 minutes from me inserting the windows disk to completely install windows
gaming is a breeze thanks to a 3gbs readwrite speed likewise for large photoshop files
works like a dream very easy to install but it does not come with the screws needed i was lucky i had spares
easy to install and set up under the disc management wizard in windows 10 be sure you have a spare nvme ssd slot in your laptop before buying most laptops post 2015 have the required extra m2 slot
great ssd does what it meant to
great ssd faster than anything i had before made me realise i need to update my home network when the full bandwidth was 1 of drive usage
my pc has never been so fast its amazing advertised speeds right out of the box

installed as a secondary ssd in my alienware m15 interestingly although it stated that the 2nd ssd will run as a nvme pcie 2x it still gives readingwriting speeds above 3400 mb does not come with screw to fix it
easy to install without heatsinklaptop temperature stable below 65 degrees on heavy workload
fitted great but would help if you included a tint screw i had to pinch one from hard drive case
brilliant upgrade for your pc cheap and makes a big difference on load times about 6 times faster than the ssd i was using according to userbenchmark
its a well made product it really shines on speed also it came to me on the time stated wish it was a little cheaper
not the most durable for the money but a nice drive otherwise
perfect
excellent
perfect for your main hd to boot and run games from my pc starts up in 40 seconds max
just buy it im happy with my purchase
hes happy with it
perfect working

western digital once again prove they have the best price to performance on the market its not a massive price difference compared to samsung and other brands but its nice to save a little only downside is the lower endurance but i doubt the average consumer will ever wear one of these out

very fast
much better than sata ssd
fast good price and reliable so far
easy to install very fast
fast mtbf 18 milion hours good price
easy and professional
worked as expected easy to install
exactly as advertised keep in mind that drive performance improves with larger capacity drives a 256 gb drive will be slower than a 12 tb drive

bought this to use as secondary storage for games as i only had a 500gb ssd with os and handful of games very easy to install and set up in windows by formatting the drive

i should say that this wont improve your fps in games this will greatly reduce load times which is worth the purchase
this thing is really fast i am using it as a boot drive and this drive makes ssd feel like hdd when compared on boot times

my other nmve corsair stopped being recognised by the computer broke so i decided to buy a name i trust so far its all good it works and its fast if there are any changes to the reliability then i will update
my laptop is now 10x faster everything loads super quick including the infamous skyrim loading screen bit of a faff to install but that was due to my laptop not the product

this worked fine great speed etc but after 14 months it died restarted computer one day it was gone wouldnt show up in disk management at all bios would not recognise that an m2 drive was present replaced with a samsung drive that worked fine after switching it out not the end of the world but would certainly expect a longer lifespan from an ssd
have been used for over a month without a problem
too early to say anything about reliability but is fine so far very fast
brought a 12tb one that plugged in and just worked set to x4 on motherboard getting 5 x my standard ssd got a 1tb one now as well just for games they seem to load a lot faster

the performance is good but the temperature is getting to 70°c with a thermal pad and copper plate on i dont didnt think this ssd is going to last that long with that kind of temperature so i returned it
has a very large capacity allowing for various games to be installed and a fast speeds which allow for games to opened and loaded quickly

getting the full speed advertised on a new install of windows doesnt come with screws but my mobo had them already at first glance it is as advertised

gigagbyte aorus elite x570
amd 3600
thermaltake 16gb 3600

not much to say it was extremely easy to install for my first ever build
it loads the customs map on tarkov in around 20 seconds for me might differ my memory isnt amazing
worked right first time and now the laptop is working much faster
smooth installation into a new build amazingly fast transfer speeds
goods arrived very quickly from germany on time and as desctibed
very quick and lots of storage
macbook pro 15 2015 wdblack sn750 1tb read 2830 write 2774 works stably even under load
performance as expected
this ssd was incompatible with my asus vivobook s14 s430fa laptop
used this for my gaming pc to upgrade from a mechanical hardrive
product is as described
its everything i expected it to be and more
using with the 2019 mac pro via pci adapter very fast
fast and reliable
very fast at a very affordable price
speeds as advertise slightly faster than samsung 970 evo doesnt run too hot

i can only get 1621 mbs read out of this drive g when its advertised at 3430mbs

my samsung evo 970 e gets the 3563mbs without issues
didnt work sent back
it loads really fast

how could it possible that the performance is the same as intel p600 regarding the 4k rw speed

btw the temperature is around 60 degree even without using
all good not sure why people moan about a screw not being supplied they come with your motherboard

installed to ps 5 and bang sorry but not having this one message appears on the screen so dont but for ps5 guys
probably a fantastic stick for a laptop or pc no doubt but ps 5 is nat having it
does what it says on the box had no probs with it 5 min install which is straight forward

exactly what the description says one of the fastest options really easy to install however it may be more difficult depending on your system ie if you have a difficult to open laptop
totally recommended
make sure your pclaptop can work at that speed otherwise you will be wasting money if your device is old
great for gaming reasonably priced for the performance youre getting but doesnt come with any parts to install it which is a tad annoying considering youre paying £120
my first m2 and it is quick my only problem was my msi mb could not detect it until i had flashed the bios
great storage for fast boot times and installation no need to worry about your loading times as this ssd takes all the stress off of you
its really only 930 gb rather than 1tb as advertised i know theres always some wiggle room when it comes to memory but 7 less is fairly annoying
terrible reliability and average speed probably one of the worst nvme ssds ive owned over the years

came soon than expected quick install if your mobo isnt already installed but annoying if it is

no issues thus far and no it doesnt come with the screws needed
